channel.title: Need Help with Runelocus Callback please
channel.description:
This is my Callback link in the admincp for Runelocus. The google is not a troll, that's the name of a forum that this forum won't allow to censor, just for those who were wondering.
[code]http://www.google.com/top-rsps-list/vote-39986-AnnihilatedPkerz%20-%20Pking%20Server/?i=[/code]
I tried this link what sk8rdude gave me, but this link just keeps telling me I've voted already, even though it's passed over 24hours. (not blaming on you btw sk8rdude, you've done great help with me. Dw) [code]http://www.google.com/toplist/vote-39986-AnnihilatedPkerz%20-%20Pking%20Server/?i=[/code]
And this is the Runelocus Callback URL.
[code]http://www.annihilatedpkerz.com/vote/php/callback.php[/code]
Yet it keeps saying, please vote on all Links. Wuuht?

item.title: Need Help with Runelocus Callback please
item.dc:creator: @imback4more imback4more
item.description:
@imback4more wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:547304”]Basically, all I added to the link is:
http://www.google.com/top-rsps-list/vote-39986-AnnihilatedPkerz%20-%20Pking%20Server/?i=
This was because GTL vote uses your IP to track votes, and rLocus changed their entire vote system. So I took the get tag from the runetoplist one, which uses ?i=Your_ip_here. I don’t know specifically how Locus’s callback system works. I’m sure you could look on their site, and check.
The get may not be needed, it may still be needed.
But, as I stated before, Moparscape does not have a callback system. If you add it to your vote page (which I know you have it on there currently), it will more than likely say “please vote on all links”.

Note: I just went on your page, didn’t even vote, hit continue, and it worked. Twice.[/quote]

ok thnkx, and I need help with this now.

Hey guys, So i downloaded smf theme inferno for my forum. I tried to check and see if the password recovery emails work. It says it has sent the email to reset your password. But its been 2 days and still nothing. I had 7 of my other players trying it yesterday and they havent gotten the email link neither. What’s up with this?
Help please. Thnkx.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with Runelocus Callback please

item.title: Need Help with Runelocus Callback please
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Basically, all I added to the link is:
http://www.google.com/top-rsps-list/vote-39986-AnnihilatedPkerz%20-%20Pking%20Server/?i=
This was because GTL vote uses your IP to track votes, and rLocus changed their entire vote system. So I took the get tag from the runetoplist one, which uses ?i=Your_ip_here. I don’t know specifically how Locus’s callback system works. I’m sure you could look on their site, and check.
The get may not be needed, it may still be needed.
But, as I stated before, Moparscape does not have a callback system. If you add it to your vote page (which I know you have it on there currently), it will more than likely say “please vote on all links”.

Note: I just went on your page, didn’t even vote, hit continue, and it worked. Twice.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with Runelocus Callback please
